name: DUSTNET Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The complete original soundtrack for DUSTNET composed by Iven Jansen, includes 17 tracks in .mp3 format.



01 - Menu
02 - _Rounds
03 - Nullworld
04 - Shrines
05 - Frames
06 - enter
07 - asym
08 - H3cker
09 - Re_enter
10 - Re_surge
11 - phases I
12 - phases II
13 - last_Round
14 - nullgate.x-it
15 - Re_Menu
16 - .1n m3m0r14m
17 - .b-theme

short_description: The complete original soundtrack for DUSTNET composed by Iven Jansen, includes 17 tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
